critique: The document is a formal executive order regarding the Coast Guard operating as part of the Navy during a national emergency. The language is legal and procedural. There is a sense of urgency and resolve, but emotions are largely suppressed in favor of clarity and authority. Initial scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 2, Fear: 3, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 2. Revised scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 2, Fear: 3, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 2
